valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Lows Rockall 995 and Sole 999 losing their identities by 0600 Monday, low Biscay 999 expected Plymouth 993
